title: 98/726/EC: Commission Decision of 24 November 1998 on a derogation from Decision 71/128/EEC on the Advisory Committee on Fisheries (notified under document number C(1998) 3591)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 24 November 1998 on a derogation from Decision 71/128/EEC on the Advisory Committee on Fisheries (notified under document number C(1998) 3591) (98/726/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: By way of derogation from Articles 4 and 5 of Decision 71/128/EEC, the members of the Advisory Committee on Fisheries as well as the Chairman and the two Vice-Chairmen, shall remain in office until the date of the appointment of the new Committee or until 31 July 1999 at the latest.
This Decision shall apply with effect from 15 November 1998.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 November 1998.
For the Commission
Emma BONINO
Member of the Commission
